posts.post_content:
BUMP - price drop - $35 for Deshler, $55 for Nicholls. Price includes shipping BMWT. 

I have two 1910 C52s (Canadian T218) that I'd like to sell. Pricing these is a bit more difficult (unlike the T218s) as there are very few comps out there and only a handful have been graded by the major companies. 

I may be a bit high in pricing of these, but am certainly willing to consider reasonable offers (especially if you take both). 

Looking for $50 on Deshler, $75 for Nicholls.
Bump, prices dropped, open to offers
